verbose_text: Using previously defined reaction parameters, we revealed that increasing levels of positive feedback could amplify small differences in VEGFR activity between coupled ECs to drive rapid reciprocal VEGFR-Notch activation and patterning of ECs (XREF_FIG D and 1E).
evidence: VEGFR activity between coupled ECs to drive rapid reciprocal VEGFR-Notch activation and patterning of ECs
